name: White Bunny
customerDescription: Little white bunny, ever so white; with two pointy ears, that stand upright.

mementos.name: Purse
mementos.description: Looks very light, as if there is nothing inside.

mementos.name: Calculator
mementos.description: Continuously pressing buttons will produce cool robotic sounds.
mementos.requirement:
Serve White Bunny 1500 times. 
Sell 2000 Taiyaki.

mementos.name: Rabbit Hat
mementos.description: Knitted from the fur that Rabbit gave to the chef. It's very warm.
mementos.requirement: Serve White Bunny 3000 times. Sell 3500 Taiyaki.

name: Brown Bunny
customerDescription: Common wild rabbits that are good at digging holes.

mementos.name: Carrot Cellphone
mementos.description: Although it's a cellphone, it looks like it's only good for eating.

mementos.name: Sturdy Flower
mementos.description: This flower was dug out of nowhere, but it has survived and thrived.

name: Deer
customerDescription: The most common deer in the area. I wonder when they'll get those spots on their brown fur? Picky: Rating must reach 9. Ability — Big Spender: Has a 5% chance to give x8 the amount of Cod.

mementos.name: Deer's Cracker
mementos.description: It will bestow you with Deer's good fortune.

name: Mouse
customerDescription: They're dirty and like boasting about how many places they've been.

mementos.name: Gold Chain
mementos.description: Put it on and you'll be the richest kid in Animal Restaurant.

name: Gloomy
customerDescription: Very shy but wants to make friends.

name: White Shiba
customerDescription: White, chubby foodies that only like sweets.

name: Traditional Popcorn
customerDescription: Very traditional popcorn. It creates an explosive bang while cooking.

name: Old Joe
customerDescription: Old Joe's wife sets up a stall outside the school gate everyday, while Old Joe pulls customers in the streets. The Chicky's Ends they grill are liked by all students.

name: Portrait Drawing Booth
customerDescription: Inelegantly collects ten dollars for each portrait. Though every person looks about the same, the queue is rather long.

name: Sketch Artist
customerDescription: Elegantly drawing something.

name: Picnicking Rabbit
customerDescription: The rabbit picknicking alone is enjoying a pile of food with just a tinge of loneliness.

name: Hillside's Stinkiest
customerDescription: Nobody knows how this Fried Tofu is made, nor do we dare ask.

name: Picnicking Duck
customerDescription: Camping isn't an easy thing for a family of eight.

name: Prosperity Pineapple
customerDescription: Toad's Pineapple Shop. Free if it ain't sweet!

name: Wholegrain Pancake
customerDescription: Add sausage. Add chicken fillet. Add crisp fritter.

name: Convenience Buns
customerDescription: Convenient, hygienic and tasty microwave buns.

name: Love-filled Buns
customerDescription: Buns just as advertised.

name: Reverie Cotton Candy
customerDescription: Perhaps only those with hearts filled with love can make delicious cotton candy.

name: Slum Cotton Candy
customerDescription: Full of childhood memories.

name: Stray Wild Panda
customerDescription: Looks familiar. Is it the panda? But he's very dirty and skinny.

name: Scavenging Skinny Dog
customerDescription: Give him your unwanted clothes and plastic bottles. He'll be very grateful.

name: Candied Hawthorn
customerDescription: Very sweet! Strawberries and hawthorns available!

name: Mouse Market
customerDescription: The worst mouse in the world left the circus and opened a market with his own savings. Rumors say that there's even an online store now. Try looking up 'Mouse Market'.

name: Flower Shop
customerDescription: Shiba Liang is very gentle, even to flowers.

name: Bunny's Back Garden
customerDescription: The shop owner thinks that flowers can bring happiness. That's why he opened a flower shop, in hopes that everyone will find their happiness.

name: Garden Plot
customerDescription: He only does three things everyday: reading, eating and watering flowers.

name: Cut Cake
customerDescription: The boss's eyes hide dollar signs.

name: Flora's Ring Toss
customerDescription: Chance to earn a wood carving of the Chef, personally carved by Flora.

name: Bamboo Hot and Sour Noodles
customerDescription: Boss Wiggins, the creator of the Bamboo Hot and Sour Noodles, is well-loved by those who prefer mild-tasting food.

name: Terrible Pancake
customerDescription: Only when others say your food taste awful, then is it really awful. What are you doing criticizing your own food?

name: Japanese Cuisine
customerDescription: The boss usually speaks little but, occasionally, late at night, he chats with lonely customers about the things they want to do in future.

name: Bear's Takoyaki
customerDescription: Takoyaki is especially popular with youngsters.

name: Rabbit's Breakfast
customerDescription: The best of the peddlers in the village, Top3, has extraordinary peddling skills and is planning to publish a book called 'Peddling'.

name: Hedgehog's Breakfast
customerDescription: Has just graduated from high school and is temporarily manning the stall for his family during the holidays, though he thinks this is harder than confessing to a girl.

name: Sweet Malt Candy
customerDescription: A traditional delight with a long history. Two dollars to spin the left wheel and five to spin the right, which is said to be easier to get the dragon, but ends up giving the quail every time...

name: Scavenging Puppies and Kitties
customerDescription: A cool doggo turned gentle thanks to a kitty's company.

name: Beancurd Dessert
customerDescription: Shiba's specialty beancurd.

name: Bowl Pudding
customerDescription: Smooth and delicious, rich and aromatic.

name: Ice Cream Stall
customerDescription: Sweet and yummy!

name: Golden Fried Potatoes
customerDescription: Crispy on the outside, fluffy on the inside. Looks really delicious!

name: American Hot Dog
customerDescription: A very big serving. You'll feel full after just half of it.

name: Honeydew Shaved Ice
customerDescription: Made from natural ice straight from Antarctica.

name: Traditional Bowl Pudding
customerDescription: Traditional Bowl Pudding has an even richer taste!

name: Fresh Glutinous Rice Cake
customerDescription: A common childhood snack, but hardly seen any more.

name: Egg Waffle
customerDescription: The egg waffle of childhood smells really appetizing.

name: Tailor Liu
customerDescription: After years of sewing and mending clothes, his technique is top-notch.

name: Love Salon
customerDescription: Professional hairdresser. Satisfaction guaranteed!

name: Fried Quail Eggs
customerDescription: Fried to a golden brown. It tastes even better with condiments.

name: Ice Cream Truck
customerDescription: Many flavors to choose from. Bring your own stool!

name: Street Stall Hiring
customerDescription: Although he is wearing a paper bag over his head, he looks really familiar!

name: Summer Iced Jelly
customerDescription: A bowl of handmade iced jelly full of ingredients on a hot summer day is one of the best indulgences in life!

name: Piggy's Crawdads
customerDescription: The customers are all frequent patrons, and the stall often stays open till 2 or 3 in the morning.

name: Skillful Massage
customerDescription: The therapist has top-tier techniques and strength but is also quite talkative.

name: Rainbow Shop Stationery
customerDescription: Often gets lost in storybooks and forgets that customers are here.

name: Bicycle Repairs
customerDescription: Always has dirty face and palms.

name: Encounters Photo Studio
customerDescription: Starts to feel uncomfortable if they don't take a few photos every day.

name: Love Tribe
customerDescription: Has a gaze filled with countless stories.

name: Fortunetelling
customerDescription: Has a mysterious look.

name: Professional Protectors
customerDescription: I hear they were an office worker back in the day.

name: Gold Tooth Antiques
customerDescription: Equally honest with all customers!

name: Another Roujiamo
customerDescription: Another, and another! There's no stopping!

name: Swift Roti Prata
customerDescription: I recommend the pineapple flavor. It's sweet, crunchy, and delicious!

name: Trendy Braid
customerDescription: Just by looking at it, you know it was braided by a master!

name: Uncle's Roasted Sweet Potato
customerDescription: Want a sweet potato? It'll make your winter days warmer!

name: Inconspicuous Roasted Chestnuts
customerDescription: Otto's been roasting chestnuts here for years, just waiting for that girl with the braces...

name: Romantic Hot Air Balloon
customerDescription: I want to bring you to the romantic Oak Bay!

name: Budget Witch's Soup
customerDescription: Huh? Why does this bowl of soup taste kinda... gooey and salty?

name: Sticky Rice Balls
customerDescription: Bang bang bang. It's the melody of the glutinous rice bouncing on drums.

name: Ink Calligraphy
customerDescription: You can smell the fragrance of the ink and paper from a distance.

name: Aaron Herbs
customerDescription: He always appears on time and disappears once he finishes selling his herbs.

name: Mr. Horse's Vegetables
customerDescription: Vegetables sold without the use of middlemen.

name: Mysterious Magic
customerDescription: Just standard magic tricks. The magician doesn't seem to mind that no one is watching.

name: Sweet Coconut Water
customerDescription: The shopkeeper is always smiling. He prepares the coconuts with speed and precision.

name: Fox's Oden
customerDescription: The stall only opens late at night, specifically for those who go home late.

name: Wholesale Wild Mushrooms
customerDescription: Delicious and healthy.

name: Outdoor Yoga
customerDescription: I like to do yoga outdoors when the weather is nice outside.

name: Laughter Club
customerDescription: Are you feeling down? Come and watch my performance!

name: Colorful Balloons
customerDescription: He finished twisting these balloons before I could even blink.

name: Freewheeling Doodles
customerDescription: Paint it just the way you like it!

name: Phantom Car
customerDescription: Appears out of the blue at night and vanishes abruptly before dawn.

name: Soul-Carving Booth
customerDescription: All the pumpkins carved by the boss look incredibly lifelike.

name: Magic Candy Store
customerDescription: It's clearly unmanned, yet the pumpkin automatically dispenses candy whenever customers step up.

name: Graveyard Dressing Room
customerDescription: Although the boss has a nasty temper, his skills are first-rate.

name: Beaver's Flying Daggers
customerDescription: Don't worry, everyone. Rest assured that all our performers have undergone professional training.

name: Gingerbread Man's Bar Cart
customerDescription: Would you like a warm glass of fresh red wine to keep the cold at bay this Christmas Eve?

name: Magic Bakery
customerDescription: Strange singing can be heard each time someone picks up a bun.

name: A Melody on the Bridge
customerDescription: Have a listen when you pass by. Who knows when you'll get to enjoy it again?

name: Super Value Pawnshop
customerDescription: As long as you're brave enough to pawn it, we'll take it.

name: Crispy Wafer Rolls Booth
customerDescription: Fresh from the oven! They're crispy and delicious.

name: Artisan Chihuahua
customerDescription: This booth owner can craft anything upon request.

name: Professional Welding Machine
customerDescription: Don't stare at the welding sparks for too long. It'll hurt your eyes!

name: Outdoor Livestream
customerDescription: Your support will motivate him to do even better!

name: Handmade Lemon Water
customerDescription: I'm not upset, I'm just trying to squeeze as much juice from the lemons as I can!

name: Grilled Toast
customerDescription: Take a bite and let the toast's aroma linger in your mouth!

name: Yaya's Succulents
customerDescription: Don't water the succulent plants too frequently!

name: Strange Chocolate Booth
customerDescription: Although it tastes strange, it possesses mysterious effects.

name: Magic Brooms
customerDescription: The fastest broom in the world!

name: All-knowing Magic Mirror
customerDescription: It will give you the correct answers to all your questions.

name: Mad Hatter's Afternoon Tea
customerDescription: The tea on the table is always hot, regardless of the time of day.

name: Wondrous Christmas Tree
customerDescription: Fancy making a wish? It's likely to come true!

name: Magic Tiny Train
customerDescription: What wondrous place will this tiny train take me this time?

name: Sweet Ding Ding Candy
customerDescription: Ding-a-ling! Tastes like the sweet memories of my childhood.

name: Grilled Tofu
customerDescription: Don't let the rundown exterior fool you–the boss' tofu-grilling skills are top-notch!

name: Warm Lotus Seed Dessert
customerDescription: A spoonful warms you right up.

name: Fragrant Sticky Rice
customerDescription: Sticky rice by itself is 100% delicious, but if you add a sausage, the tastiness shoots up to 10,000%!

name: Crackling Grilled Sausages
customerDescription: Three bucks for one, five bucks for two!

name: Shadow Play Theater
customerDescription: This lone booth owner controls legions on the stage!

name: Cutie Manicure
customerDescription: Available in all sorts of designs under the sun.

name: Airplane Kiddie Ride
customerDescription: Little pilot, are you up for the challenge?

name: Tiny Trampoline
customerDescription: Even though the stall keeper seems quite fierce, in reality he won't chase you away, even if you exceed the allocated time.

name: Sky-High Kite
customerDescription: Ten seconds is all we need to make a kite!

name: Penguin Coffee Cart
customerDescription: Exquisite coffee beans for an exquisite experience.

name: Mint Chocolate Cones
customerDescription: 100% made by hand, the cones emit a rich aroma.

name: Knitting Lamb
customerDescription: This stall's products are all made of 100% wool. It is said that the stall owner can knit the trendiest designs.

name: Strongman Game
customerDescription: Only the strongest of warriors are worthy of this challenge.

name: Skeleton Puppet Show
customerDescription: The puppet is far more flexible than the puppeteer.

name: Handicrafts For Charity
customerDescription: A booth selling handicrafts by Oak Bay Elementary School students. All proceeds go to charity! The students apparently worked really hard on the handicrafts when they learned that they'd be helping those in need.

name: Rainbow Snowboards
customerDescription: Get a super detailed guidebook on snowboarding techniques with every purchase!

name: Antique Clock Repairs
customerDescription: Just like memories, time must also be preserved.

name: Sixth Bookstore
customerDescription: Many valuable books can be found here.

name: Cozy Churros
customerDescription: It's best to eat something warm and toasty during wintertime.

name: Exquisite Lanterns
customerDescription: Does any of the lanterns catch your fancy?

name: Kungfu Teahouse
customerDescription: The booth owner is a master of the kungfu move known as 'The White Goose Spreads Its Wings.'

name: Mr. Bear's Woodblocks
customerDescription: His dominant arm is much more muscular than his other arm.

name: Sizzling Squid
customerDescription: Only fresh catch here! Have as much squid as you want!

name: Customized Gown
customerDescription: Every stitch is painstakingly handsewn by the tailor.

name: Sword in the Stone Challenge
customerDescription: Will I be king if I pull it out?

name: Goldfish Scooping
customerDescription: You need to control your strength and timing. Want to give it a try?

name: Street Coffee
customerDescription: Authentic, handcrafted coffee!

name: Aero's Sliced Noodles
customerDescription: Up they fly, down they fly, and into the pot they fly!

name: Leisure Golf
customerDescription: Practice your golf skills, anywhere, anytime.

name: Aromatic Cheese Shop
customerDescription: Do you like Swiss cheese or blue cheese?

name: Border Collie's Fresh Seafood
customerDescription: An unassuming shop that sells fresh seafood. There's always a long queue.

name: Jin's Magic Wands
customerDescription: I heard that the wands choose their own masters.

name: Invisibility Cloaks
customerDescription: Makes you invisible when you wear it!

name: Magical Matches Booth
customerDescription: Rumors say that visions of delicious food appear when the matches are lit.

name: Cozy Winter Hat Booth
customerDescription: You're sure to find the perfect hat here.

name: Cutie White Bunny
customerDescription: A member of the Cutie Girlies. Behind her cute appearance is a skillful rapper.

name: Cutie Hamster
customerDescription: A member of the Cutie Girlies. She may be short, but her dancing dominates the stage!2

name: Cutie Goose
customerDescription: A member of the Cutie Girlies. She has a very special voice and is a very special lead singer.

name: Cutie Guru
customerDescription: A member of the Cutie Girlies. The secret powerhouse of the group.

name: Little Piggy Angel
customerDescription: A member of the Little Angels Chorus. Likes singing and dancing and is working hard to improve her singing.

name: Little Turtle Angel
customerDescription: A member of the Little Angels Chorus. The leader of the group and a born singer.

name: Little Yorkie Angel
customerDescription: A member of the Little Angels Chorus. Loves singing but is completely tone deaf.

name: Little Shiba Angel
customerDescription: A member of the Little Angels Chorus. Is happiest when singing along with everyone!

name: Bassist Toad
customerDescription: A member of The Croaks. A perfect gentleman.

name: Guitarist Toad
customerDescription: A member of The Croaks. Is extremely passionate about music and often indulges in it.

name: Vocalist Toad
customerDescription: A member of The Croaks. Loves the band and has a steadfast heart.

name: Drummer Toad
customerDescription: A member of The Croaks. Doesn't talk much.

name: Vocalist Samoyed
customerDescription: Founder of Sakura Soda. Killer move: A smile that cures all sadness.

name: Guitarist Husky
customerDescription: Member of Sakura Soda. His aloofness draws a lot of attention from the girls.

name: Bassist Border Collie
customerDescription: Member of Sakura Soda. For straight-A students, everything is a breeze, including bass.

name: Accompanist Penguin
customerDescription: Member of Sakura Soda. He only shakes the maracas when you think he's slacking off.

name: Lead Dancer Slim White Dog
customerDescription: Member of Nebulae. Has 8 years of dancing experience. Loves life, but loves dancing even more.

name: Lead Singer Dalmatian
customerDescription: Member of Nebulae. Has a sweet voice that can heal your heart.

name: Rapper Bean
customerDescription: Member of Nebulae. An energetic rapper.

name: Leader Scotch Collie
customerDescription: Member of Nebulae. An all-rounded leader that everyone counts on.

name: Leader Pug
customerDescription: Member of Ball Lightning. With his knack for music, he provides an emotional anchor for all members.

name: Guitarist Jackal
customerDescription: Member of Ball Lightning. Wild on stage, quiet off stage. Appears rather aloof.

name: Bassist Brown Wolf
customerDescription: Member of Ball Lightning. Always with a smile on his face, he seems to have a hidden glorious past.

name: DJ Wolf
customerDescription: Member of Ball Lightning. Great at livening up the atmosphere.

name: Piano Contender
customerDescription: A member of Laughing Out Loud. Proficient in performing rhythmic rap storytelling to the beat of bamboo clappers. It is said that he may even outshine a piano in a group act.

name: Bamboo Hand Fan
customerDescription: A member of Laughing Out Loud. His vocal skills and a bamboo hand fan are all he needs to delight the audience.

name: Natural Comedian
customerDescription: A member of Laughing Out Loud. Owing to his comical appearance, the audience frequently roar in laughter even before he begins his performance.

name: Chopper
customerDescription: A member of Laughing Out Loud. Boasts a strong foundation. Rattles off fluent and perfectly sound sentences with ease.

name: Probiotic Panther
customerDescription: A member of Sweet Yogurt. He's a bit of a scatterbrain, but the team really relies on him.

name: Frisky Pangolin
customerDescription: A member of Sweet Yogurt. He's a ball of energy and always goes all out during performances.

name: Zippy Koala
customerDescription: A member of Sweet Yogurt. Very responsible despite his young age. Always eagerly helping his leader wrap up loose ends.

name: Sweetie Curly
customerDescription: A member of Sweet Yogurt. As the youngest, everyone treats her very well.

name: DuBond
customerDescription: The refined and gentlemanly principal cellist of the Sunshine Symphony.

name: Louise
customerDescription: A reticent member of the Sunshine Symphony who is often found immersed in the world of music.

name: Danielle
customerDescription: A member of the Sunshine Symphony. For some reason, people easily nod off when they listen to her perform.

name: Marcus
customerDescription: The leader and conductor of the Sunshine Symphony. Though he has an odd way of speaking, he is highly accomplished as an artist.

name: Pretty Face
customerDescription: A member of Eight Tones Band. She is the eldest among the four members and is calm and reliable. Her specialty is the Rebound Pipa.

name: Drunken Rouge
customerDescription: A member of Eight Tones Band. She doesn't talk much, preferring to communicate by playing the guzheng in a way that imitates human speech instead.

name: Exquisite Jade
customerDescription: A member of Eight Tones Band. She is the youngest among the members and is very popular among all age groups. All the customers love her.

name: Princess Feather
customerDescription: A member of Eight Tones Band. She wanted to learn how to play the drums, but due to lack of strength, she turned to playing the sheng instead. Surprisingly enough, she turned out to be rather talented at it.

name: Rat-a-tat
customerDescription: He's the one who started Cheesy Notes. He plays the cheese drums because he's the strongest band member!

name: Dingle-dangle
customerDescription: She's the youngest member of Cheesy Notes. Although she seems somewhat lazy, she never misses a beat!

name: Ta-da-da
customerDescription: A member of the Cheesy Notes, she personally bakes the bread that she uses in every performance. She also stores her bread carefully and strives to put on the best performance possible.

name: Thump-thump
customerDescription: A member of Cheesy Notes, he is quite rotund in appearance. Extremely lovable, he is well-liked by all.

name: Busy Bee-trice
customerDescription: A member of the Pomegranate Dance Troupe’s management team. She is always hustling and bustling.

name: Steady Sally
customerDescription: Despite being the oldest member of the Pomegranate Dance Troupe, her form remains impeccable. Her fundamentals are rock solid!

name: Gentle Grace
customerDescription: A member of the Pomegranate Dance Troupe, she has such a kind disposition that even the naughtiest children will listen to her words.

name: Elegant Emily
customerDescription: A stylish lady and the youngest member of the Pomegranate Dance Troupe.

name: Backing Vocalist Beaver
customerDescription: A member of the Aloha Band. While those who hear her singing praise its ethereal qualities, she prefers more rhythmical expressions than actual singing.

name: Soloist Beaver
customerDescription: A member of the Aloha Band. Even though he's typically absent-minded, once he starts to perform, he'll always give it his all.

name: Accompanist Beaver
customerDescription: A member of the Aloha Band, and also a foodie. His motto is, 'I can only play the drums on a full belly.'

name: Backup Dancer Beaver
customerDescription: A member of the Aloha Band. A passionate dancer that's able to groove to all kinds of music, she is capable of hyping up any crowd.

name: Aaron
customerDescription: A member of Minty Popping Candy. Despite being the youngest member of the band, he carries the largest drum. Perhaps he's a child prodigy?

name: Belle
customerDescription: The tallest and liveliest member of Minty Popping Candy. However, she's easily distracted.

name: Ella
customerDescription: A member of Minty Popping Candy. Once a rhythm starts, she can instantly follow the beat. What a reliable musician!

name: Chris
customerDescription: The lead member of Minty Popping Candy. Gentle, composed, and detail-oriented.

name: Windrider
customerDescription: Member and founder of Cloudrise Tai Chi. The set of tai chi swordplay techniques he created enjoys high praise among all who learn it.

name: Moondancer
customerDescription: A member of Cloudrise Tai Chi. Rather than practicing tai chi at dawn, he finds taking in the moon's energy on moonlit nights much more effective.

name: Cloudmaster
customerDescription: A member of Cloudrise Tai Chi. He moves with such grace and power that nobody can stop him from going where he wishes. His one move 'The White Crane Spreads Its Wings' is an unforgettable sight.

name: Snowwalker
customerDescription: A member of Cloudrise Tai Chi. Regular training has made him quick and light on his feet, allowing him to walk on snow without leaving paw prints.

name: Minty Star
customerDescription: The happy-go-lucky member of Puff Planet. His voice is as lovely as his bell instrument.

name: Frosty Star
description: The calm member of Puff Planet. He likes playing the flute in a corner by himself.

name: Pudding Star
description: The member of Puff Planet with a muddle-headed personality, but it makes it easy to distinguish him from his twin.

name: Honey Star
description: A member of Puff Planet. Joined the band for stress relief from work, but takes his performances very seriously.

name: Dancing Flamingo
description: A member of the Lightseeker Ballet Troupe and aiming to become the principal dancer. It is said they can continue dancing even while asleep.

name: Dancing Ostrich
description: A member of the Lightseeker Ballet Troupe and the face of the group. They can learn new dance moves very quickly.

name: Dancing Swan
description: A member of the Lightseeker Ballet Troupe. Although she often complains during training, she always excels during performances.

name: Dancing Wild Duck
description: A member of the Lightseeker Ballet Troupe. Calm and composed, she is able to solve problems with ease.

name: Aurora Polar Bear
description: A member of the Aurora Puppet Club. Occasionally nods off during performances.

name: Aurora Arctic Hare
description: A member of the Aurora Puppet Club. Frequently surprises audiences with his performances.

name: Aurora Fuzzy
description: A member of the Aurora Puppet Club. Possesses an incredible sense of rhythm.

name: Aurora Sheep
description: A member of the Aurora Puppet Club. A musical genius who effortlessly creates exquisite melodies.

name: Rich Kid
customerDescription: Doesn't care too much about money and just wants to travel around. Dreams of opening a restaurant.

name: Ad Salesman
customerDescription: Very shy and afraid of being chased out, but still perseveres at work!

name: Cod-Stealing Rabbit
customerDescription: Always borrows without returning. When will it end?

name: Skunk
customerDescription: He's extremely troubled by his own habitual nature and can only try his best to avoid crowded spaces.

name: Card-Playing Mouse
customerDescription: A famous magician in Las Vegas who excels at reading minds.

name: Wandering Singer
customerDescription: When the parrot begins to sing, the area becomes his own stage.

name: New Year Mouse
customerDescription: A costume borrowed from who knows where.

name: Rascal
customerDescription: A mischievous rascal that everyone dislikes.

name: Rascal's Dad
customerDescription: Behind every rascal, lurks a pair of rapscallion parents.

name: Rascal's Mom
customerDescription: Behind every rascal, lurks a pair of rapscallion parents.

name: Christmas Elf
customerDescription: Quietly leaves presents while you're sleeping.

name: New Year Calf
customerDescription: Likes traditional things and is always methodical.

name: Cowherd
customerDescription: We are like a pair of mandarin ducks.

name: Weaver Girl
customerDescription: Flying side by side through the world.

name: Dani
customerDescription: Will stop immediately when seeing something adorable.

name: Halloween Ragdoll
customerDescription: Made by an old tailor, this ragdoll set his heart on finding his little brother.

name: Snowball 2
customerDescription: Roly-poly Snowball. If you don't keep an eye on them, they'll sneak away to slack off.

name: Tiger of Blessings
customerDescription: Looks fierce but is actually very friendly.

name: Auspicious Bunny
customerDescription: This soft and furry little friend must be especially cuddly!

name: Sugar Glider Mimi
customerDescription: Even though it sleeps very early every night, this sleepyhead is always looking for a place to nap.

name: Blessed Dragon
customerDescription: His elegance contributes to his solemn demeanor that belies an affable personality when you talk to him.

name: Felicity Nüwa
customerDescription: She always has a friendly smile for everyone she meets.

name: Halloween Pumpkin
customerDescription: Although he is a clown from the circus who amuses people, he doesn't like his job. He enjoys scaring little kids to tears.

name: Fortuneteller
customerDescription: The legendary Fortuneteller who can use the forest's mysterious forces, but whether or not you believe is up to you.

name: Mysterious Merchant
customerDescription: Covered head-to-toe in black, with eyes that peer all around. Likes shiny things, such as money.

name: Otter Dodo
customerDescription: Dreams of becoming a great magician. Still practicing though.

name: Mister Roach
customerDescription: This cutthroat competitor will stop at nothing to ruin our restaurant's business.

name: Chacha
customerDescription: Keep an eye out for him! He may steal your crops if you don't!

name: Striped Yellow Jackal
customerDescription: They're always chanting 'Fresh guts!' and 'Yay, guts!'

name: Badger
customerDescription: DON'T let him eat too many beans. If he farts, the entire restaurant is done for.

name: Spotted Deer
customerDescription: Everyone always thinks of this kind of spotted deer, but they're pretty rare around here.

name: Artist Badger
customerDescription: He is overconfident about his talent, very fussy about food, and is always pulling all-nighters to make finishing touches... but nobody has ever seen any of his paintings.

name: Wounded Bear
customerDescription: There's an unheard story behind the knife wound. The bear is a regular, and also our fish supplier!

name: Hedgehog
customerDescription: They're covered in spines but still want to hug everyone.

name: Brown Wolf
customerDescription: They're highly sociable and always go out in groups, so different from cats!

name: Striped Jackal
customerDescription: They're very sensitive to expiration dates and like cold-tossed pancreas.

name: Blueberry Hedgehog
customerDescription: Blueberry fanatics.

name: Sheep
customerDescription: During grazing season, they're all over the mountains and plains. A type of sheep from the neighbor's pasture.

name: Yellow Jackal
customerDescription: They've got bright eyes and look like they're ready to pounce at any moment.

name: Swan
customerDescription: When he was little he thought he was a duck, but when he grew up he still thought he was a duck, so he's not too mean.

name: Wolf
customerDescription: Normal wolves. They eat meat with every meal.

name: Scarred Bear
customerDescription: There's a faint scar on his belly. He always looks down.

name: Granny Wolf
customerDescription: Even though he's male, he's taken to wearing a silk scarf that he found somewhere and learned to tie from watching humans.

name: Border Collie
customerDescription: If you ever lose something, you can go find them. They can get it back with a single sniff and never ask for compensation.

name: French Bulldog
customerDescription: They're quite pompous, and they all think they're of noble blood.

name: Bald Sheep
customerDescription: Isn't he cold? At the very least he could wear some clothes. Everyone feels kinda awkward looking at him.

name: Lop-Eared Rabbit
customerDescription: They're always chewing on pieces of grass.

name: Otter
customerDescription: They handle all the woodworking in this area. The houses and furniture they make are all sturdy and durable. They're saving the money they earn to build an even bigger dam.

name: One-Eyed Papillon
customerDescription: He's a dog of few words, and nobody dares talk to him. He seems to hate humans.

name: Fox
customerDescription: Even though he's fully grown, he still tries to act cute to get what he wants. Just give him whatever he asks for. The chef'll pay for it.

name: Raccoon
customerDescription: Their tummies are always rumbling, but they never go hungry.

name: Terrier
customerDescription: They look like old men.

name: Field Dog
customerDescription: Has a bit of an underbite and may not be well-liked among humans. I hear they can't even live in the city.

name: Shiba
customerDescription: They're always waiting for something by the intersection. Don't be fooled by their serious faces; they often think of something and start laughing.

name: Ostrich
customerDescription: We made the door higher just for them.

name: Paper Bagged Ostrich
customerDescription: A shy guy.

name: Berry Hedgehog
customerDescription: They tend to worry, so they like to hoard food. They'll curl up into a ball if they get frightened.

name: Chocolate Lab
customerDescription: These city-slickers get all suave whenever they see a human.

name: Chocolate Border Collie
customerDescription: These city-slickers get all suave whenever they see a human.

name: Boar
customerDescription: They're related to pigs, but they've got an entirely different temper, so take care when you're serving them

name: Black Shiba
customerDescription: They love to go for walks and play tug-of-war.

name: Black Lab
customerDescription: Has unlimited energy, a huge appetite, good teeth, and stinky breath, possibly from chewing too many shoes...

name: Boston Terrier
customerDescription: The chef doesn't like these kinds of customers.

name: Merle Border Collie
customerDescription: These dogs look super cool, but they'd rather play with people than dogs.

name: Pug
customerDescription: They're so stinky that the chef stays far away whenever he sees them, but they're welcomed by the other animals because they're good at playing dumb and listening in on the humans' secrets. They're always gossiping.

name: Corgi
customerDescription: A stingy pup who likes fighting with others. If he breaks the tableware, make sure he pays up!

name: Speckled Pig
customerDescription: They used to be farm animals, but they were abandoned because they grew too fast. How could a pig NOT grow?

name: Husky
customerDescription: These easy-going kings of destruction are always liked by female dogs, but nobody cares for their wisdom.

name: Tri-Colored Corgi
customerDescription: As pretty as any other corgi.

name: Pig
customerDescription: They're always asking if they've lost weight...but they're still as chubby as ever.

name: Old Collie
customerDescription: You usually won't see them on rainy days.

name: Fennec Fox
customerDescription: They may look young, but they're actually menopausal! They always feel hot, so they like cold foods and drinks.

name: Penguin
customerDescription: Don't ask me why there are penguins here. I have no idea! Everyone likes hearing their stories about faraway glaciers.

name: White-Collar Fox
customerDescription: They're always in a hurry to pay and seem to do business with some dangerous man. We like these kinds of customers!

name: Lynx
customerDescription: They look a bit strange... Nobody's seen this kind of cat before.

name: Dachshund
customerDescription: Loves waxing herself.

name: Rescue Dog
customerDescription: A pup of high morals who can tell you all about disasters.

name: Sloth
customerDescription: These sloths are probably more active than others, as they haven't got any mushrooms growing on them.

name: Polar Bear
customerDescription: A homeless and rare type of bear.

name: Slim White Dog
customerDescription: She always likes to stay in shape.

name: Insta-Pup
customerDescription: He always has the latest mobile camera on his neck.

name: Flamingo
customerDescription: Enjoys sleep and has a slight inferiority complex.

name: Gnome
customerDescription: He's rarely seen, but those who do see him will be in luck.

name: Mushroom Sloth
customerDescription: He's so lazy a mushroom's grown on his head.

name: Influencer Flamingo
customerDescription: She puts on sunglasses and thinks she's all that, but even influencers will go out in style!

name: Tiger
customerDescription: Looks like he could be Jiji's distant relative.

name: Little Black Dog
customerDescription: Nobody knows what breed he is, but everyone likes him!

name: White Rabbit
customerDescription: He's holding his watch like he's late for something.

name: Cheshire Cat
customerDescription: He's always grinning. Don't believe anything he says! I do think I've seen him in some fairytale, though...

name: Reporter
customerDescription: He's carrying a backpack and a camera. He doesn't seem like a bad guy.

name: Glamourous Lady
customerDescription: This species has a penchant for leopard print.

name: Scotch Collie
customerDescription: Has a very long face.

name: Programmer's Dog
customerDescription: The colors have been washed from his clothes.

name: Dalmatian
customerDescription: A very loyal dog.

name: Party Puppy
customerDescription: Just came back from a party without even removing her hat.

name: Green-Hat Gnome
customerDescription: An even rarer gnome. If you see him, you'll be super-duper lucky!

name: Cici
customerDescription: A melancholy human girl.

name: Lucky Pig
customerDescription: Happy Year of the Pig! All is well in the world!

name: Shiba Puppy
customerDescription: The shiba couple's pup. Chubby just like dad!

name: Alpaca
customerDescription: Super soft with a gentle personality. Be careful not to get too close though—you might get spat on!

name: Little Lion
customerDescription: Has a head of golden fur that makes the bald animals jealous. Loves meat, but is very gentle.

name: Abi
customerDescription: A bald programmer. He needs to be ready to fix bugs at any time, so he's always holding a computer.

name: Little Fox
customerDescription: A little red fox with a big, bushy tail.

name: Squirrel
customerDescription: Enjoys meddling in others' affairs.

name: Wild Duck
customerDescription: Likes wetlands and ponds.

name: Wood-chuckin' Beaver
customerDescription: Hailing from Xinjiang, they have iconic paddle-shaped tails and are rarely seen nowadays.

name: Brown Horse
customerDescription: People think he is lonely, but he enjoys his freedom. That is his nose, not his eyes.

name: Yorkie Mom
customerDescription: Mom is a high class VIP member of the hair salon. She insists on eating walnuts and black sesame paste every day. She spends an average of 8 hours a day brushing her hair. While this might seem like a daily chore to others, she enjoys it very much.

name: Yorkie Dad
customerDescription: Dad wants to go to the salon for a haircut, because his hair is so long that his eyes are covered. However, Mom says 'Hair gives us life! Cutting off your hair is like cutting away our life!'

name: Pink Piggy
customerDescription: Pink Piggy is always happy. His smile and chubby face can rid friends of all bad luck!

name: Yorkie Pup
customerDescription: Pup is a boy but Mom insists that he not cut his hair, so he looks very cute. Everyone always compliments him, 'Such a cute little girl!'

name: Bean
customerDescription: Has sharp little teeth that are especially good at gnawing through cables.

name: Dr. Puppy
customerDescription: The skin on his hand is peeling from repeated hand-washing. Has strange marks on his face.

name: Moon Rabbit
customerDescription: A rabbit with a story. He used to work in an office but quit to live in a small town in the country. He likes to fish.

name: Capybara
customerDescription: The favorite kindergarten teacher of the children. She is peace-loving and takes good care of her health.

name: Pangolin Baby
customerDescription: Got separated from his mother and is going around everywhere asking about her.

name: Pangolin Mama
customerDescription: The gentle animal was caught by the poachers before but managed to escape. She is now looking for her own baby when she hears on the radio that some ancient book seems to have changed some things.

name: Guru
customerDescription: Gumi's distant cousin. She's a gentle and cute little girl, but Gumi is always afraid of her.

name: Red Squirrel
customerDescription: Fur as red as fire. Looks a bit like Little Fox.

name: Beaver Engineer
customerDescription: A student learning ecological engineering with excellent results. Can build dams, help to fight drought, improve water quality, and even combat climate change.

name: Alaska
customerDescription: A calm and composed big dog, but is often mistaken for Husky.

name: Asian Elephant
customerDescription: Tall and large. Likes playing with kids.

name: Hippopotamus
customerDescription: An unemployed youth who loves playing games.

name: Snow Leopard Pup
customerDescription: Adorable but very playful, and a little rebellious too.

name: Snow Leopard
customerDescription: A father who is trying hard to learn parenting techniques.

name: Adventurer Stoat
customerDescription: Comes from a faraway planet. Rumor has it that she has been to countless places.

name: Beancurd
customerDescription: Mumbles a bit due to the recent tooth extraction.

name: Rice Cake
customerDescription: Her loud voice contrasts sharply with her cute look.

name: Moose
customerDescription: The antlers on its head are too big and are always hitting into others.

name: Aries
customerDescription: A dependable and gentle member of the Forest Firefighters.

name: Curly
customerDescription: Despite the young age, she's an absolute connoisseur of food.

name: Dorkie
customerDescription: A bookworm who carries an encyclopedia wherever he goes.

name: Little Koala
customerDescription: New transfer student in Oak Bay Elementary School.

name: Yannis
customerDescription: A muscular hunk who works out a lot.

name: Mooey
customerDescription: It's still teething, so it constantly wants to chew on something.

name: Mr. Bharal
customerDescription: A teacher in charge of outdoor activities at summer camp. Extremely skilled at rock climbing.

name: Chihuahua
customerDescription: Nobody knows why he becomes so aggressive when someone gets too close.

name: Brown Chihuahua
customerDescription: A connoisseur who is determined to find out the recipe when presented with a delectable dish.

name: Black & White Chihuahua
customerDescription: Lover of corny jokes. He gets angry if no one laughs at them.

name: Lilith
customerDescription: Elegant and full of artistic eloquence.

name: Rose
customerDescription: Always brimming with passion and bringing joy to everyone. Nobody has ever seen her downcast.

name: Snowy
customerDescription: Loves everything related to snow! Travels to wherever there is snow to be found.

name: Sleepwalking Little Lion
customerDescription: 9 out of 10 dreams he has are related to food.

name: Arctic Hare
customerDescription: He's always on the beet phone looking extremely busy. However, no one knows what he's busy with.

name: Mystifying Crane
customerDescription: A mystifying and enigmatic swordsman who seems to be highly skilled in martial arts.

name: Nozy
customerDescription: Enjoys watching and listening in on others' affairs with poker face. You'll find him wherever there is gossip.

name: Black Papillon
customerDescription: A math genius whose mental calculation skills outperform those of someone using a calculator.

name: Eugene the Tree-kangaroo
customerDescription: Applied for a yearly pass to a boxing class so that he would stand out among the programmers.

name: Bernese Mountain Pup
customerDescription: A scatterbrain that always listens to her owner.

name: Miss Rhino
customerDescription: Likes cute clothes.

name: Manager Bear
customerDescription: The manager of a certain influencer. It's rumored that the two of them argue all the time.

name: Golden Retriever
customerDescription: So amiable that he'll still come up and talk to you even if you responded coldly the last time.

name: Little Colt
customerDescription: Sports natural curls in his mane, but because they're difficult to maintain, he spends a lot of time styling them every day.

name: White Mouse
customerDescription: Looks much cleaner than other types of rodents.

name: Fancy Rat
customerDescription: A pet rat that slips out of the master's house in search of a nice meal.

name: Grandpa Spirit Bear
customerDescription: You can smell the scent of butter when you're near the super friendly bear.

name: Amber
customerDescription: An aloof and secretive customer with a personality that doesn't match her appearance.

name: Dracula
customerDescription: What?! Could it be one in the legends?!

name: Ahau
customerDescription: Anyone who locks eyes with him can't help but surreptitiously take a step back and keep their distance from him.

name: Lil' Duckling
customerDescription: A restless little duckling.

name: Longevity Fox
customerDescription: Despite its small stature, it can run rapidly even when there's someone riding on its back.

name: Deer of Nine Colors
customerDescription: Lingers near kind people and brings good luck to them.

name: Dragony
customerDescription: Wears a dragon-shaped headgear, seemingly to conceal his identity. How mysterious...

name: Weeping Croc
customerDescription: A romance novelist who weeps in distress whenever he suffers from a lack of inspiration.

name: Axolotl
customerDescription: Could someone as cute as her truly harbor any bad intentions?

name: Goofy
customerDescription: A seemingly goofy and good-natured customer.

name: Honey Badger
customerDescription: Works as a beekeeper because he loves honey very much.

name: Lil' Giraffe
customerDescription: Despite her small age, she's already quite tall.

name: Quokka
customerDescription: This happy and positive customer is always seen with a smile.

name: German Shepherd
customerDescription: A retired police dog, but highly dependable to have around.

name: Annie
customerDescription: Always buys lots of stuff with a smile on her face.

name: Harpy Eagle Wizard
customerDescription: A mysterious wizard from a faraway nation. Only ever shows three-quarters of his profile.

name: Black Panther
customerDescription: A ticket inspector who is very passionate about the job.

name: Cong Cong
customerDescription: Owing to its six legs, this bold creature can move incredibly fast. It is said to have a tendency to emphasize words that share the consonant in its name when it speaks.

name: Er Shu
customerDescription: A legendary being that is neither a mouse nor a rabbit, despite its resemblance to both.

name: Cyborg Danny
customerDescription: Are they human... or an android?

name: Fuzzy
customerDescription: Looks perpetually tired.

name: Meery
customerDescription: An alien enthusiast. Strongly believes in the existence of extraterrestrial life.

name: Squiddy
customerDescription: A customer from another planet. Makes squishy noises when walking.

name: Lemur
customerDescription: Able to sunbathe for an entire day if the sun is out.

name: Elephant Shrew
customerDescription: The tip of its nose is so long that it looks like it might break anytime.

name: Alicia
customerDescription: To save her brother, she has never stopped crocheting.

name: Damascus Goat
customerDescription: His favorite color is pink.

name: Hansel
customerDescription: He's said to be looking for a candy house in Oak Bay with his sister.

name: Gretel
customerDescription: Looking for the Candy House with her brother in the oak forest.

name: Emperor Tamarin
customerDescription: Not everyone with a white beard is a grandpa!

name: Clown
customerDescription: Little children hide in fright when they see the clown (not exactly). Can you guess who this is?

name: Vampire
customerDescription: The clothes don't really fit. Can you guess who this is?

name: Werewolf
customerDescription: Will grow muscles and fangs when the moon is full. The werewolf even wear underwear. Can you guess who this is?

name: Ghoul
customerDescription: Bed sheets cannot hide the big tail. Can you guess who this is?

name: Mummy
customerDescription: Tightly-wrapped bandages, freshly resurrected from inside the pyramid. Can you guess who this is?

name: Witch
customerDescription: Graduated from Hogwarts, but unable to find a job. Can you guess who this is?

name: Infernal Emissary
customerDescription: This robed figure comes and goes like a shadow, with a hat covering most of their face.

name: Old Captain
customerDescription: A mean-looking old captain. Shh, don't talk about his height to his face!

name: Hopping Zombie
customerDescription: Its legs may be short, but it sure can jump!

name: Little Dino
customerDescription: A dinosaur that loves every second of work.

name: Gnome Bean
customerDescription: Loves to wield its wand and make things disappear.

name: Frankenpooch
customerDescription: His brows are locked in a huge frown, and there are unidentified stains on his clothes.

name: Party Skeleton
customerDescription: Wears fluorescent party wristbands that glow in the dark.

name: Invisible Bunny
customerDescription: Unless you look closely, you'll mistake her for a pile of moving clothes.

name: Little Red Riding Hood
customerDescription: Adorable but taciturn, she rarely shows anyone what is in her basket.

name: Little Yeti
customerDescription: Roars cutely as he ambles along.

name: Ghost Soldier
customerDescription: His head looks like it weighs a ton.

name: Chainsaw Puppy
customerDescription: It looks very scary holding a chainsaw, but it's actually just a plastic toy.

name: Nine-tailed Fox
customerDescription: She walks with light steps and has a graceful posture.

name: Old Fan
customerDescription: Holding cuffs in its hands, it specializes in capturing disobedient spirits. Looking closely at its hat, you can see the words 'World Peace'.

name: Old Xie
customerDescription: He has a long tongue that hangs outside his mouth and is always smiling. Looking closely at his hat, you can see the words 'Fortune at a glance'.

name: Supernatural Enthusiast
customerDescription: Believes that there are spirits in this world. During Halloween every year, he goes around looking for places with strong magnetic field fluctuations.

name: Exorcism Descendant
customerDescription: A lonely traveler. His faith is reflected on his icy crossbow bolt.

name: God of Wine
customerDescription: He smells more like grapes than wine.

name: Spartan Warrior
customerDescription: His armor looks very heavy.

name: Trumpeting Angel
customerDescription: Flies around everywhere on wings, especially adored by everyone.

name: Imp
customerDescription: Who knows when another silly idea will pop into his head.

name: Wolf Magistrate
customerDescription: He has a stern businesslike demeanor.

name: Anubis
customerDescription: Guardian of the Dead

name: Fox Bride
customerDescription: It is said that on the day a fox gets married, rain will fall while the sun shines in the sky.

name: Granny Meng
customerDescription: Should you really drink the soup that she's holding...

name: Praying Samoyed
customerDescription: A dog who loves going to shrines in the springtime to pray for himself and his friends.

name: Tom
customerDescription: His droopy eyes make him look a bit down, but he's actually a very gentle cat. He's Gumi's friend.

name: Duke Swallow
customerDescription: A foreign swallow here on holiday. Loves Chinese culture and food.

name: Mister Gecko
customerDescription: A professional mosquito killer who often finds it hard to forget when he's not working.

name: Sheepie
customerDescription: First time going outside alone. Curious about almost anything.

name: Little Beagle
customerDescription: It's always 110% chock-full of energy. One can't help but wonder where it gets all that vigor from.

name: Platypus
customerDescription: An agriculture major up to their neck in their final year project.

name: Bigmouth Bird
customerDescription: Don't ever let it overhear anything you say. It's already privy to too much gossip in town.

name: Penniless Toad
customerDescription: A poor and defeated toad who's always saying his savings are only in the double digits. He's unwilling to spend anything on himself, but he's always generous toward others. He only comes out on the hottest days.

name: Little Turtle
customerDescription: It's summer vacation! This little turtle is learning to find food at restaurants alone and wants to make more friends.

name: Fashionable Zebra
customerDescription: A very fashionable zebra who is especially nit-picky and talkative. He thinks he's the top influencer.

name: Tapir
customerDescription: Summer is the season of many dreams. Maybe you'll meet him in your dreams.

name: Old Gene
customerDescription: With a wave of his straw fan, everything will be fine.

name: Greedy Hedgehog
customerDescription: Always eats until its belly is round and full.

name: Goober
customerDescription: A guinea pig who is on a diet.

name: Uncle Marty
customerDescription: Runs a farm that grows tons of lemons.

name: Hamster
customerDescription: Its puffy cheeks are like a bottomless pit.

name: Devil Squirrel
customerDescription: Has quite a bad temper and is skittish, always running away at the slightest noise or movement.

name: Wandering Bard
customerDescription: A little panda who enjoys traveling and adventure. He collects various stories and sings of them.

name: Prawny
customerDescription: Her friends think that she's a sophisticated and elegant teddy, but her personality is the opposite in private.

name: Leopard
customerDescription: Has a melancholic look in his eyes. Nobody knows what is on his mind.

name: Binturong
customerDescription: A cartoonist new to the business, working hard on scripts and storyboards every day.

name: Donkey
customerDescription: Carrots are the only thing this perennially happy customer eats.

name: Prince Secretarybird
customerDescription: Excudes an air of notability and elegance.

name: Cher
customerDescription: A novice skier who injured her arm while skiing.

name: Lady Snow Fox
customerDescription: Has a youthful appearance, and is always up-to-date with the latest fashion trends.

name: Mister Tibetan Fox
customerDescription: Lady Snow Fox's husband. He loves and respects her very much—if Lady Snow Fox says she's going east, he won't dare go west.

name: Seal Pup
customerDescription: Dazed as if he just woke up, confused about his whereabouts.

name: Upturned-Brows Penguin
customerDescription: His flashy brows and the scar at the corner of his eye make him look like there's more to him than meets the eye.

name: Arctic Wolf
customerDescription: A wolf native to the Arctic. Why does it look a little weird?

name: Mole
customerDescription: Although he's getting on in years, he still has a keen sense of smell.

name: Forest Ranger Tibetan Mastiff
customerDescription: Looks commanding at first glance, but is actually very amiable.

name: Painter Penguin Doll
customerDescription: Clumsy and pessimistic, often blames himself for being good for nothing. Wishes to paint a new wall.

name: Kimono Goose
customerDescription: Just returned from a tour in Japan, still wearing a kimono. Complains about how her feet hurt but refuses to take off the clogs.

name: Unyoung Lady
customerDescription: Age is just a number, you are never too old to do something.

name: Hip-hop Toad
customerDescription: Got hooked onto hip-hop recently. Settles differences with rap battles.

name: Picnic Lop-Eared Rabbit
customerDescription: Fears loneliness. Often tries to blend into other's social circles.

name: Sporty Dog
customerDescription: Has a workout plan to complete. Bought some new clothes of subpar quality, but they will suffice.

name: Indoor Toad
customerDescription: Loves staying at home. Snacks and dramas are enough.

name: Uniformed Shiba Puppy
customerDescription: Loves going to school in the new uniform. Hides candies in its pocket.

name: Uniformed Yorkie Pup
customerDescription: Received the wrong uniform from the teacher. Hates being jeered by his peers.

name: Student Samoyed
customerDescription: Looks happy and carefree, but his faint smile hides dark secrets.

name: Bully Husky
customerDescription: Husky in his high school days, very particular about being manly.

name: Student President Merle Border Collie
customerDescription: A student who is self-disciplined, the role model for everyone.

name: Hanfu White Bunny
customerDescription: A refined, elegant, classical rabbit.

name: Starstruck Corgi
customerDescription: Aaaaahh, my idol is the best in the world!

name: Ballet Piggy
customerDescription: A piggy can be graceful and charming too!

name: Lucky
customerDescription: Wishing you a fortunate new year!

name: Prospero
customerDescription: Wishing you a year of progress!

name: Hale
customerDescription: Wishing you a healthy new year!

name: Wild Duck Navigator
customerDescription: One small step for me, one big step for the ducks!

name: Little Racer
customerDescription: Beep! I lose if I see the tail lights of the toy car.

name: Tropical Island
customerDescription: Move your body to the rhythm of the waves.

name: White Shiba Bride
customerDescription: Wearing a white wedding dress on this special day.

name: Shiba Groom
customerDescription: I do!

name: Little Turtle Sailor
customerDescription: He has a small body but a big dream to conquer the seas.

name: Kungfu Kid
customerDescription: The kungfu of the family can never be shared with others!

name: Part-timer Cici
customerDescription: Went to work in the store because seeing the store uniform was too cute.

name: Little Lady
customerDescription: It's hard to resist spinning around after putting on a dress.

name: Magic Chihuahua
customerDescription: A reluctant champion of world peace who attentively performs his duty.

name: Gentleman Dobermann
customerDescription: The umbrella is his soul.

name: Sweet Nurse
customerDescription: Such a cute nurse. I'm sure her injections won't hurt!

name: Sleeping Baby Elephant
customerDescription: Wear this one-piece pajamas and be a baby elephant in your dreams.

name: Demure Maiden
customerDescription: Bring along a beach umbrella and enjoy a leisurely vacation before autumn ends!

name: Little Fox in Raincoat
customerDescription: Who can resist the temptation of stepping in a puddle?

name: Frog Prince
customerDescription: They say that a kiss can turn him back to his original state.

name: Volleyball Second Spiker
customerDescription: Volleyball is not a one-man battle!

name: Frosting Elf
customerDescription: Ring the bell and he will appear with candy!

name: Clockwork Penguin
customerDescription: Turn the key counterclockwise three times and clockwise five times, and it'll start moving!

name: Snow Queen
customerDescription: She brings the first snow of winter.

name: Lucky Curly
customerDescription: New clothes are a must for the new year!

name: Mister Fox
customerDescription: Fox's new part-time job: background actor in a TV drama.

name: Unicorn
customerDescription: Every single strand of hair has been impeccably conditioned, giving off an alluring scent.

name: Hot Dog Promoter
customerDescription: Hot dogs are no doubt tasty, but you should also finish all the lettuce!

name: Cowboy Fennec Fox
customerDescription: It's never the silver bullets that defeat you. Instead, it's the relentless march of time.

name: Cha-cha Scotch Collie
customerDescription: Dance passionately to the beat!

name: Fragrant Fairy
customerDescription: With a dress made of fresh flowers and clothes made from morning dew, it's another fragrant day!

name: Rising Star Curly
customerDescription: Born among beauty and hope in a faraway galaxy! Let me introduce you to-Rising Star Curly!

name: Moon Goddess
customerDescription: A goddess from an ancient and mysterious civilization that commands a profound deference.

name: Ditzy Crocheter
customerDescription: Always having to undo their stitches to start all over because they can't remember where they left off.

name: Mime Actor
customerDescription: Has an occupational habit so ingrained that they never speak, only gesturing to express themselves.

name: Trainee Postman
customerDescription: He may be new, but he takes extremely good care of letter assigned to him.

name: Phantom of the Raccoon
customerDescription: He must have a full stomach each time he performs. Otherwise, he'll feel fatigued during the performance.

name: Miss Hydrangea
customerDescription: The invariably shy customer has a fan with her at all times so that nobody can recognize her.

name: Tuxedo Thief
customerDescription: He seems to think very highly of his appearance.

name: Forest Elf
customerDescription: Finds joy in collecting different-colored maple leaves.

name: Reindeer Curly
customerDescription: She's Santa's little helper!

name: Apple Girl
customerDescription: Would you like to buy some apples? They're crisp and sweet!

name: Rotund Little Snowman
customerDescription: Round and bouncy.

name: Peach Garden Eldest Brother
customerDescription: The eldest of the Peach Garden sworn brothers, he is forthright and sincere.

name: Peach Garden Middle Brother
customerDescription: The second of the Peach Garden sworn brothers, he is brave and loyal.

name: Peach Garden Youngest Brother
customerDescription: The youngest of the Peach Garden sworn brothers, he is carefree and upright.

name: Fisherman Old Gin
customerDescription: He fishes up anything but fish.

name: Green Snorkeler
customerDescription: All the little fishes seem to appear green in the water!

name: Strawberry Sweetie
customerDescription: I'm the bunny who loves strawberries the most in the whole wide world!

name: Bee Puppy
customerDescription: Can I play with the bees if I dress like this?

name: Summer Waitress
customerDescription: What a cheery outfit! But I'll be happier if I was wearing this to somewhere other than work.

name: Street Artist
customerDescription: A cool guy with his own way of doing things.

name: Novice Baker
customerDescription: Having just dipped his toes into baking, he follows the recipe down to the letter, including the required ingredients and stated durations.

name: Black Shiba Pilot
customerDescription: Only obtained his pilot's license recently.

name: Formal Granny Wolf
customerDescription: Dress like the main character you wish to be.

name: Strange Doll
customerDescription: Looks cute but has a weird vibe about her.

name: Exotic Dancer
customerDescription: Whenever it walks, the gossamer fabric sways in the wind and the trinkets tickle merrily. How delightful!

name: Sideline Piggy
customerDescription: With that cheerful and bright smile of hers, who can resist buying her products before the soccer match begins?

name: Lady Yellow Rose
customerDescription: A black veil enshrouds the rose's beauty. Just what does fate have in store for her...

name: King Chihuahua
customerDescription: It looks rather imposing for some reason...

name: Little Bunny Bear
customerDescription: Although he looks rather stern at first, once he puts on his headgear, he suddenly seems very cute and unassuming.

name: Water-loving Dalmatian
customerDescription: It likes to spray water at you when you least expect it.

name: Starlight Researcher
customerDescription: Every clear and tranquil night, they would sit atop a mountain and study the starlight.

name: Candy Emissary
customerDescription: With so much candy hidden under the hat, you'll be sure to find anything that you want.

name: Madam White Snake
customerDescription: A thousand-year-old snake spirit who has taken on human form, she finds everything around her new and intriguing.

name: Xu Xian
customerDescription: A kindhearted man who often offers a helping hand to those in need.

name: Speckled Pig Caveman
customerDescription: Follow your primitive instincts.

name: Lion Farmer
customerDescription: Searching for serenity in the fields.

name: Scientist Terrier
customerDescription: Seeks truth from facts and engages in research.

name: Super Pitcher
customerDescription: In search of the perfect trajectory.

name: Mysterious Detective
customerDescription: When everyone else is baffled and uncertain about their next step, he always manages to find the critical piece of evidence that solves the case.

name: Nameless Swordsman
customerDescription: A straw cape and a wine gourd are all he needs to wander the world.

name: Qipao Granny Wolf
customerDescription: The picture of elegance.

name: Gentle Poet
customerDescription: Sitting under a tree and feeling the cool breeze while drinking hot green tea. There's no better way to enjoy life than this!

name: Mural Artist
customerDescription: Works on each piece of art with utmost dedication.

name: Greedy Hedgehog (Doll Figure)
customerDescription: Who took a bite of the donut?!

name: Ranger Squirrel
customerDescription: Travels far and wide to uphold justice.

name: Countess
customerDescription: Has a haughty gaze.

name: Soprano Performer
customerDescription: They may be able to sing in a beautiful voice, but doing so out of nowhere still startles people around.

name: Velvet Bean
customerDescription: Will be photographed when he goes to the mall.

name: Skilled Handyman
customerDescription: Reassures everybody with the way they calmly complete their tasks at hand.

name: Ace Mixologist
customerDescription: As the breadwinner of his family, he also works part-time at the bar.

name: Pirate Stoat
customerDescription: Looks like she's wearing local fashion from another planet.

name: Yuki-onna
customerDescription: The surrounding temperature seems to lower when you get close to her.

name: Barista
customerDescription: Looks like he is mature and considerate.

name: Basketball Forward
customerDescription: Able to twirl a basketball while walking.

name: Autumn Quokka
customerDescription: Loves every autumntime dish!

name: Balloon Artist
customerDescription: It's said that she can twist balloons into all sorts of interesting shapes.

name: Miss Florist
customerDescription: She's surrounded by a light floral fragrance.

name: Bathrobe Platypus
customerDescription: And so, a precious day of free time from agricultural research comes to an end.

name: Christmas Tree Donny
customerDescription: It's hard not to wonder why he's dressed like this.

name: Candy Salesman
customerDescription: A friendly Candy Salesman who is well-liked by everyone.
